posts.post_title: FS: T206 SGC cards Tough Backs
posts.post_content:
For sale T206 SGC cards.  All cards ppd.  Please email me and respond to thread.  Thanks

SGC 60, $95 each:

Krause, pitching
Raymond  SOLD
Nattress

SGC 40:
Russ Ford, Tolstoi  $80
Wilhelm $40 SOLD
Jesse Tannenhill $40 SOLD

Duffy, Sov 460: $200
Duffy, Tolstoi  SGC 20: $80  SOLD

SGC A, $50 each, I believe all were deemed trimmed, big disappointment.  They measure correct and as you can tell are very nice cards, too bad some seems to have did some handy work to them.

Overall & Schmidt SOLD
